## Voice.ConnectOptions type

Options to pass to the [Voice.connect()](./voice-react-native-sdk.voice_class.connect_method.md) method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type ConnectOptions = {
        params?: Record<string, string>;
        contactHandle?: string;
        notificationDisplayName?: string;
    };
```
